name: Adaptability
flavor_text:
Powers up moves of the
same type.

name: Aerilate
flavor_text:
Normal-type moves become
Flying-type moves.

name: Aftermath
flavor_text:
Damages the foe landing
the finishing hit.

name: Air Lock
flavor_text: Negates weather effects.

name: Analytic
flavor_text:
Boosts move power when
the Pokémon moves last.

name: Anger Point
flavor_text:
Raises Attack upon taking
a critical hit.

name: Anticipation
flavor_text:
Senses the foe’s
dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap
flavor_text: Prevents fleeing.

name: Aroma Veil
flavor_text:
Protects allies from attacks that
limit their move choices.

name: As One
flavor_text:
This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s
Unnerve Ability and Glastrier’s Chilling Neigh Ability.

name: Aura Break
flavor_text:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities
are reversed.

name: Bad Dreams
flavor_text:
Reduces a sleeping foe’s
HP.

name: Ball Fetch
flavor_text:
If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch
the Poké Ball from the first failed throw
of the battle.

name: Battery
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

name: Battle Armor
flavor_text: Blocks critical hits.

name: Battle Bond
flavor_text:
Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the
Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes
Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

name: Beast Boost
flavor_text:
The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokémon.

name: Berserk
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a 
hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

name: Big Pecks
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon from
Defense-lowering attacks.

name: Blaze
flavor_text: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

name: Bulletproof
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon from
some ball and bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
flavor_text:
Restores HP as well when
the Pokémon eats a Berry.

name: Chilling Neigh
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a
chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Chlorophyll
flavor_text: Raises SPEED in sunshine.

name: Clear Body
flavor_text: Prevents ability reduction.

name: Cloud Nine
flavor_text: Negates weather effects.

name: Color Change
flavor_text: Changes type to foe’s move.

name: Comatose
flavor_text:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.

name: Competitive
flavor_text:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when
a stat is lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
flavor_text: Raises accuracy.

name: Contrary
flavor_text:
Makes stat changes have
an opposite effect.

name: Corrosion
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s
a Steel or Poison type.

name: Cotton Down
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters
cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of
all Pokémon except itself.

name: Curious Medicine
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine
from its shell, which removes all stat changes
from allies.

name: Cursed Body
flavor_text:
May disable a move used
on the Pokémon.

name: Cute Charm
flavor_text: Infatuates on contact.

name: Damp
flavor_text: Prevents self-destruction.

name: Dancer
flavor_text:
When another Pokémon uses a dance move,
it can use a dance move following it regardless
of its Speed.

name: Dark Aura
flavor_text:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Dark-type moves.

name: Dauntless Shield
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat when the Pokémon
enters a battle.

name: Dazzling
flavor_text:
Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.

name: Defeatist
flavor_text:
Lowers stats when HP
becomes half or less.

name: Defiant
flavor_text:
When its stats are lowered
its Attack increases.

name: Delta Stream
flavor_text:
Affects weather and eliminates all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

name: Desolate Land
flavor_text:
Affects weather and nullifies any
Water-type attacks.

name: Disguise
flavor_text:
Once per battle, the shroud that covers the
Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

name: Download
flavor_text:
Adjusts power according
to the foe’s ability.

name: Dragon’s Maw
flavor_text: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

name: Drizzle
flavor_text: Summons rain in battle.

name: Drought
flavor_text: Summons sunlight in battle.

name: Dry Skin
flavor_text:
Reduces HP if it is hot.
Water restores HP.

name: Early Bird
flavor_text: Awakens quickly from sleep.

name: Effect Spore
flavor_text: Leaves spores on contact.

name: Electric Surge
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the
Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Emergency Exit
flavor_text:
The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.

name: Fairy Aura
flavor_text:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Fairy-type moves.

name: Filter
flavor_text:
Powers down super­
effective moves.

name: Flame Body
flavor_text: Burns the foe on contact.

name: Flare Boost
flavor_text:
Powers up special attacks
when burned.

name: Flash Fire
flavor_text: Powers up if hit by fire.

name: Flower Gift
flavor_text:
Powers up party Pokémon
when it is sunny.

name: Flower Veil
flavor_text:
Prevents lowering of ally
Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.

name: Fluffy
flavor_text:
Halves the damage taken from moves that make
direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

name: Forecast
flavor_text: Changes with the weather.

name: Forewarn
flavor_text:
Determines what moves
the foe has.

name: Friend Guard
flavor_text:
Reduces damage done
to allies.

name: Frisk
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can check
the foe’s held item.

name: Full Metal Body
flavor_text:
Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Fur Coat
flavor_text:
Halves damage from
physical moves.

name: Gale Wings
flavor_text:
Gives priority to Flying-type
moves.

name: Galvanize
flavor_text:
Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Gluttony
flavor_text:
Encourages the early use
of a held Berry.

name: Gooey
flavor_text:
Contact with the Pokémon
lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Gorilla Tactics
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows
the use of the first selected move.

name: Grass Pelt
flavor_text:
Boosts the Defense stat
in Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Grim Neigh
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a
terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Gulp Missile
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back
with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey
to attack.

name: Guts
flavor_text: Ups ATTACK if suffering.

name: Harvest
flavor_text:
May create another
Berry after one is used.

name: Healer
flavor_text:
May heal an ally’s status
conditions.

name: Heatproof
flavor_text:
Weakens the power of
Fire-type moves.

name: Heavy Metal
flavor_text:
Doubles the Pokémon’s
weight.

name: Honey Gather
flavor_text:
The Pokémon may gather
Honey from somewhere.

name: Huge Power
flavor_text: Raises ATTACK.

name: Hunger Switch
flavor_text:
The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between
its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of
each turn.

name: Hustle
flavor_text: Trades accuracy for power.

name: Hydration
flavor_text:
Heals status problems if
it is raining.

name: Hyper Cutter
flavor_text: Prevents ATTACK reduction.

name: Ice Body
flavor_text:
The Pokémon regains HP in
a hailstorm.

name: Ice Face
flavor_text:
The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as
a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s
appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

name: Ice Scales
flavor_text:
The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve
the damage taken from special moves.

name: Illuminate
flavor_text: Encounter rate increases.

name: Illusion
flavor_text:
Comes out disguised as
the Pokémon in back.

name: Immunity
flavor_text: Prevents poisoning.

name: Imposter
flavor_text:
It transforms itself into
the Pokémon it is facing.

name: Infiltrator
flavor_text:
Passes through the foe’s
barrier and strikes.

name: Innards Out
flavor_text:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.

name: Inner Focus
flavor_text: Prevents flinching.

name: Insomnia
flavor_text: Prevents sleep.

name: Intimidate
flavor_text: Lowers the foe’s ATTACK.

name: Intrepid Sword
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat when the Pokémon
enters a battle.

name: Iron Barbs
flavor_text:
Inflicts damage to the
Pokémon on contact.

name: Iron Fist
flavor_text:
Boosts the power of
punching moves.

name: Justified
flavor_text:
Raises Attack when hit by
a Dark-type move.

name: Keen Eye
flavor_text: Prevents loss of accuracy.

name: Klutz
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can’t use
any held items.

name: Leaf Guard
flavor_text:
Prevents status problems
in sunny weather.

name: Levitate
flavor_text: Not hit by GROUND attacks.

name: Libero
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the
move it’s about to use.

name: Light Metal
flavor_text:
Halves the Pokémon’s
weight.

name: Lightning Rod
flavor_text: Draws electrical moves.

name: Limber
flavor_text: Prevents paralysis.

name: Liquid Ooze
flavor_text: Draining causes injury.

name: Liquid Voice
flavor_text: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

name: Long Reach
flavor_text:
The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact
with the target.

name: Magic Bounce
flavor_text:
Reflects status-
changing moves.

name: Magic Guard
flavor_text:
The Pokémon only takes
damage from attacks.

name: Magician
flavor_text:
The Pokémon steals the held item
of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

name: Magma Armor
flavor_text: Prevents freezing.

name: Magnet Pull
flavor_text: Traps STEEL-type POKéMON.

name: Marvel Scale
flavor_text: Ups DEFENSE if suffering.

name: Mega Launcher
flavor_text: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

name: Merciless
flavor_text:
The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the
target is poisoned.

name: Mimicry
flavor_text: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

name: Minus
flavor_text: Powers up with PLUS.

name: Mirror Armor
flavor_text:
Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that
the Pokémon receives.

name: Misty Surge
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Mold Breaker
flavor_text:
Moves can be used
regardless of abilities.

name: Moody
flavor_text:
Raises one stat and
lowers another.

name: Motor Drive
flavor_text:
Raises Speed if hit by an
Electric-type move.

name: Moxie
flavor_text:
Boosts Attack after
knocking out any Pokémon.

name: Multiscale
flavor_text:
Reduces damage when HP
is full.

name: Multitype
flavor_text:
Changes type to match
the held Plate.

name: Mummy
flavor_text:
Contact with this Pokémon
spreads this Ability.

name: Natural Cure
flavor_text: Heals upon switching out.

name: Neuroforce
flavor_text: Powers up moves that are super effective.

name: Neutralizing Gas
flavor_text:
If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle,
the effects of all Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified
or will not be triggered.

name: No Guard
flavor_text:
Ensures the Pokémon and
its foe’s attacks land.

name: Normalize
flavor_text:
All the Pokémon’s moves
become the Normal type.

name: Oblivious
flavor_text: Prevents attraction.

name: Overcoat
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon from
damage from weather.

name: Overgrow
flavor_text: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

name: Own Tempo
flavor_text: Prevents confusion.

name: Parental Bond
flavor_text:
Parent and child
attack together.

name: Pastel Veil
flavor_text:
Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from
being poisoned.

name: Perish Body
flavor_text:
When hit by a move that makes direct contact,
the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns
unless they switch out of battle.

name: Pickpocket
flavor_text:
Steals an item when hit
by another Pokémon.

name: Pickup
flavor_text: May pick up items.

name: Pixilate
flavor_text:
Normal-type moves become
Fairy-type moves.

name: Plus
flavor_text: Powers up with MINUS.

name: Poison Heal
flavor_text:
Restores HP if the
Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Poison Point
flavor_text: Poisons foe on contact.

name: Poison Touch
flavor_text:
May poison targets when a
Pokémon makes contact.

name: Power Construct
flavor_text:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokémon changes
its form to Complete Forme.

name: Power Spot
flavor_text: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

name: Power of Alchemy
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Prankster
flavor_text:
Gives priority to a
status move.

name: Pressure
flavor_text: Raises foe’s PP usage.

name: Primordial Sea
flavor_text:
Affects weather and nullifies any
Fire-type attacks.

name: Prism Armor
flavor_text: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Propeller Tail
flavor_text:
Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and
moves that draw in moves.

name: Protean
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to
the type of the move it’s using.

name: Psychic Surge
flavor_text:
Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when
the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Punk Rock
flavor_text:
Boosts the power of sound-based moves.
The Pokémon also takes half the damage from
these kinds of moves.

name: Pure Power
flavor_text: Raises ATTACK.

name: Queenly Majesty
flavor_text:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Quick Draw
flavor_text: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

name: Quick Feet
flavor_text:
Boosts Speed if there is a
status problem.

name: RKS System
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.

name: Rain Dish
flavor_text: Slight HP recovery in rain.

name: Rattled
flavor_text:
Some move types scare
it and boost its Speed.

name: Receiver
flavor_text: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Reckless
flavor_text:
Powers up moves that
have recoil damage.

name: Refrigerate
flavor_text:
Normal-type moves become
Ice-type moves.

name: Regenerator
flavor_text:
Restores a little HP when
withdrawn from battle.

name: Ripen
flavor_text: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Rivalry
flavor_text:
Raises Attack if the foe
is of the same gender.

name: Rock Head
flavor_text: Prevents recoil damage.

name: Rough Skin
flavor_text: Hurts to touch.

name: Run Away
flavor_text: Makes escaping easier.

name: Sand Force
flavor_text:
Boosts certain moves’
power in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s
Speed in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Spit
flavor_text:
The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by
an attack.

name: Sand Stream
flavor_text: Summons a sandstorm.

name: Sand Veil
flavor_text: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
flavor_text:
Boosts Attack when hit by
a Grass-type move.

name: Schooling
flavor_text:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.

name: Scrappy
flavor_text:
Enables moves to hit
Ghost-type foes.

name: Screen Cleaner
flavor_text:
When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of
Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for
both opposing and ally Pokémon.

name: Serene Grace
flavor_text: Promotes added effects.

name: Shadow Shield
flavor_text:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes
while its HP is full.

name: Shadow Tag
flavor_text: Prevents the foe’s escape.

name: Shed Skin
flavor_text: Heals the body by shedding.

name: Sheer Force
flavor_text:
Removes added effects to
increase move damage.

name: Shell Armor
flavor_text: Blocks critical hits.

name: Shield Dust
flavor_text: Prevents added effects.

name: Shields Down
flavor_text:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

name: Simple
flavor_text:
The Pokémon is prone to
wild stat changes.

name: Skill Link
flavor_text:
Increases the frequency
of multi-strike moves.

name: Slow Start
flavor_text:
Temporarily halves Attack
and Speed.

name: Slush Rush
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

name: Sniper
flavor_text:
Powers up moves if they
become critical hits.

name: Snow Cloak
flavor_text:
Raises evasion in a
hailstorm.

name: Snow Warning
flavor_text:
The Pokémon summons a
hailstorm in battle.

name: Solar Power
flavor_text:
Boosts Sp. Atk, but
lowers HP in sunshine.

name: Solid Rock
flavor_text:
Powers down super­
effective moves.

name: Soul-Heart
flavor_text: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

name: Soundproof
flavor_text: Avoids sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
flavor_text: Gradually boosts SPEED.

name: Stakeout
flavor_text:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.

name: Stall
flavor_text:
The Pokémon moves after
even slower foes.

name: Stalwart
flavor_text:
Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and
moves that draw in moves.

name: Stamina
flavor_text: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

name: Stance Change
flavor_text:
The Pokémon changes form
depending on how it battles.

name: Static
flavor_text: Paralyzes on contact.

name: Steadfast
flavor_text:
Raises Speed each time
the Pokémon flinches.

name: Steam Engine
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat drastically if hit by a
Fire- or Water-type move.

name: Steelworker
flavor_text: Powers up Steel-type moves.

name: Steely Spirit
flavor_text: Powers up ally Pokémon’s Steel-type moves.

name: Stench
flavor_text: Helps repel wild POKéMON.

name: Sticky Hold
flavor_text: Prevents item theft.

name: Storm Drain
flavor_text:
The Pokémon draws in all
Water-type moves.

name: Strong Jaw
flavor_text:
The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives
it tremendous biting power.

name: Sturdy
flavor_text: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.

name: Suction Cups
flavor_text: Firmly anchors the body.

name: Super Luck
flavor_text:
Heightens the critical-hit
ratios of moves.

name: Surge Surfer
flavor_text:
Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on
Electric Terrain.

name: Swarm
flavor_text: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

name: Sweet Veil
flavor_text:
Prevents itself and ally Pokémon
from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
flavor_text: Raises SPEED in rain.

name: Symbiosis
flavor_text:
The Pokémon can pass
an item to an ally.

name: Synchronize
flavor_text: Passes on status problems.

name: Tangled Feet
flavor_text:
Raises evasion if the
Pokémon is confused.

name: Tangling Hair
flavor_text:
Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.

name: Technician
flavor_text:
Powers up the Pokémon’s
weaker moves.

name: Telepathy
flavor_text:
Anticipates an ally’s
attack and dodges it.

name: Teravolt
flavor_text:
Moves can be used
regardless of Abilities.

name: Thick Fat
flavor_text: Heat-and-cold protection.

name: Tinted Lens
flavor_text:
Powers up “not very
effective” moves.

name: Torrent
flavor_text: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

name: Tough Claws
flavor_text:
Powers up moves that
make direct contact.

name: Toxic Boost
flavor_text:
Powers up physical
attacks when poisoned.

name: Trace
flavor_text: Copies special ability.

name: Transistor
flavor_text: Powers up Electric-type moves.

name: Triage
flavor_text: Gives priority to a healing move.

name: Truant
flavor_text: Moves only every two turns.

name: Turboblaze
flavor_text:
Moves can be used
regardless of Abilities.

name: Unaware
flavor_text:
Ignores any change in
ability by the foe.

name: Unburden
flavor_text:
Raises Speed if a held
item is used.

name: Unnerve
flavor_text:
Makes the foe nervous and
unable to eat Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
flavor_text:
If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact,
it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Victory Star
flavor_text:
Boosts the accuracy of its
allies and itself.

name: Vital Spirit
flavor_text: Prevents sleep.

name: Volt Absorb
flavor_text: Turns electricity into HP.

name: Wandering Spirit
flavor_text:
The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon
that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Water Absorb
flavor_text: Changes water into HP.

name: Water Bubble
flavor_text:
Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the
Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting
a burn.

name: Water Compaction
flavor_text:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit
by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
flavor_text: Prevents burns.

name: Weak Armor
flavor_text:
Physical attacks lower
Defense and raise Speed.

name: White Smoke
flavor_text: Prevents ability reduction.

name: Wimp Out
flavor_text:
The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.

name: Wonder Guard
flavor_text: “Super effective” hits.

name: Wonder Skin
flavor_text:
Makes status-changing
moves more likely to miss.

name: Zen Mode
flavor_text:
Changes the Pokémon’s
shape when HP is halved.
